articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: here's how to win this week's debate, and the election
articles.description: The Post has some advice for Donald Trump ahead of his first debate with President Biden on CNN this week.
articles.content:
There’s no one else quite like Donald Trump.
What other candidate in American history would start polling his audience, live, as Trump did this weekend in Philadelphia, on what his debate strategy against President Biden should be?

articles.title: Ro Khanna argues Trump campaign set the bar ‘so low’ for Biden’s debate performance
articles.description: Ro Khanna dismissed concerns about Biden's ability to serve as president, arguing the president was “very sharp” a couple ofweeks ago.
